column4: Hi, How do I get ubuntu to automatically connect to my wifi without asking for the key ring password?
when I boot ubuntu, my account automatically logs in but the wifi will not connect until I type the password for "key ring"
hmmm, so I guess everybody in here that uses wifi has to type that pass word in?
right click the icon go to settings click on wifi then edit and make sure all users and auto connect are ticked on.
